module.name: User Management
module.description: This Module manages all FreePBX users excluding Administrators (at this time). It allows an Administrator to create a User Account that can be used by other applications for login or API purposes. Modules like iSymphony, Rest API and User Control Panel use this module to manage their users.
module.changelog: *12.0.25* Return true if the updateUserData function succeeds *12.0.24* FREEPBX-8527 wrap in a try catch just in case *12.0.23* Fix for resetting of passwords *12.0.22* FREEPBX-8429
